name: Binary Smashing!!!!
description:
the result of a poet with an overconfident attitude towards unity and an artist with infinite patience <3 smash down preconceived bodies, destroy the walls. ZIP features the game, plus concept art and a poem based on the creative journey that we went on.

this game is incomplete, but it's the best I can do right now. <3

art by moth
wood baseball bat from here
poetry and programming by me :)

shoutout to the TFRJ for inspiring me to start learning unity -- maybe in time I'll be able to come back and complete this, or else build off of the things I've learned to create something great.
